metadata.title: CVE-2022-23837 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In api.rb in Sidekiq before 5.2.10 and 6.4.0, there is no limit on thenumber of days when requesting stats for the graph. This overloads thesystem, affecting the Web UI, and makes it unavailable to users.

criterions.comment: ruby-sidekiq package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
